channel.description: Recent content in S3 Event Notification on

item.title: S3 Event Notification + Rekognition + ImageMagick
item.description: Detect **Bird**, **Cat** and **Dog** in images with **Rekognition** then draw the bounding box with **ImageMagick**.

item.title: Terraform + S3 + S3 Event Notification + Lambda
item.description: Terraforming **S3** and **S3 Event Notification** to change object ACL with **Lambda**.
